programme.title: Jodi No.1
programme.desc: Directed by David Dhawan, this comedy features Sanjay Dutt and Govinda as Jai and Veeru, partners in crime who flee to Goa and impersonate rich businessmen. Their plan to marry into wealth backfires hilariously as they fall for the daughters of their target, leading to a series of misadventures.

programme.title: Commando 3
programme.desc: Commando 3 is an action-packed thriller that follows Karanveer Singh Dogra (played by Vidyut Jammwal), an elite Indian commando, who is sent on a mission to London to track down and eliminate a terrorist threat. As he uncovers a deadly plot aimed at dividing India on religious lines, he must use his combat skills and intelligence to protect his country. With high-octane stunts, intense chase sequences, and a patriotic theme, the film keeps audiences on edge. Directed by Aditya Datt, it’s the third installment in the Commando series.

programme.title: Jodi No.1
programme.desc: Directed by David Dhawan, this comedy features Sanjay Dutt and Govinda as Jai and Veeru, partners in crime who flee to Goa and impersonate rich businessmen. Their plan to marry into wealth backfires hilariously as they fall for the daughters of their target, leading to a series of misadventures.

programme.title: Commando 3
programme.desc: Commando 3 is an action-packed thriller that follows Karanveer Singh Dogra (played by Vidyut Jammwal), an elite Indian commando, who is sent on a mission to London to track down and eliminate a terrorist threat. As he uncovers a deadly plot aimed at dividing India on religious lines, he must use his combat skills and intelligence to protect his country. With high-octane stunts, intense chase sequences, and a patriotic theme, the film keeps audiences on edge. Directed by Aditya Datt, it’s the third installment in the Commando series.

programme.title: Awarapan
programme.desc: Directed by Mohit Suri, Awarapan stars Emraan Hashmi as a tormented hitman working for a crime lord. When he's assigned to monitor his boss's mistress, he begins to question his life choices, leading to a path of self-discovery and redemption. The film is an uncredited remake of the South Korean movie A Bittersweet Life.

programme.title: Jodi No.1
programme.desc: Directed by David Dhawan, this comedy features Sanjay Dutt and Govinda as Jai and Veeru, partners in crime who flee to Goa and impersonate rich businessmen. Their plan to marry into wealth backfires hilariously as they fall for the daughters of their target, leading to a series of misadventures.

programme.title: Taal
programme.desc: Mansi, a gifted singer from a humble background, rises to fame and is caught between two powerful men Manav, her first love, and Vikrant, her mentor. The film explores love, ambition, and social class, all set to A.R. Rahman's iconic music.

programme.title: Ek Aur Ek Gyarah
programme.desc: Directed by David Dhawan, this action-comedy features Govinda and Sanjay Dutt as conmen Tara and Sitara. Their escapades lead them to a military household, where they masquerade as patriots, resulting in a series of comedic events. The film combines slapstick humor with action-packed sequences.

programme.title: Kismat Konnection
programme.desc: Directed by Aziz Mirza, this romantic comedy stars Shahid Kapoor as Raj Malhotra, an unsuccessful architect whose luck turns around after meeting Priya (Vidya Balan). As he starts attributing his success to her, complications arise, leading to a tale of love, destiny, and self-discovery.
